text: there shold be a way to list all the branding colors in the module setup. So a user can choose a color that is in the branding list.

the brand colors already come up in the color picker as "favorites" if they are configured, including via theme settings or modules, what benefit would there be to coding the specific brand color directly?

I could see this causing a potential issue with the colors of the theme if the branding configuration doesn't align with how the theme colors are coded (i.e light and dark scheme options).
